Articles.Content:
I don't know why, but my account was deleted. I didn't break any rules, I only had roughly 5 posts and they all had to be approved by the moderation team, so I don't get it.

Anyway, reposting to say hi, my name is Ryan I'm 20 and love all things space. Astrophysics, astronomy, you name it. I love it. I was pulled into KSP for this reason. I've gotten really good at it in the last month of owning it, and have made a successful landing on Duna, with a current project to land on Eeloo.

Great game, hope to see more in the future.

Ryan

It is because since the server crashed,the last backup that worked was on 12 August 2012,i had to redo my account,too

Welcome back and fly safe!

Welcome back Ryan, you weren't banned, as ADV-SAS says we lost a lot of threads and accounts.

The site's still gradually coming back to life thanks to the strong community here who love KSP, it's up to all of us to show the world how cool we are as a community so do your bit and start a thread or two

Ah well that's good then that I didn't do anything. I actually in the back of my head thought maybe the reason was due to the server issues.

I'll be sure to keep active.
The more threads the merrier, as long as they aren't spammy
